attributes.action: Raise pay level for NHS staff, more work related support, remove university fees
attributes.additional_details: the work has not been acknowledged/reflected with the crutical care given. Work related support for example staff handling mental unwell patients without the appropriate training or refreshment of training given. full aftercare support for NHS staff (I.e trauma related experiences, debriefing after stressful continuous work periods, reflection periods for end of shift for progress improvements /patient care). Removing University fees will increase the flow of application for new nurses.
attributes.background: Raise the annual salaries of NHS hospital staff, provide more training/support for NHS staff, new modern equipment, removing University fees.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions, calling for similar actions:

Increase pay for NHS healthcare workers and recognise their work: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073

Bonus for emergency services personnel working due to COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303306

Fund after care for all NHS staff following coronavirus: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313439

Fund free Travel, Parking, Hotel & Childcare during COVID-19 for NHS staff: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/305854

Fund free meals for NHS staff whilst on duty during the COVID19 Pandemic: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303485

Supply NHS key frontline staff working during Covid-19 healthy food hampers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306339

Fund increased death in service benefits for NHS staff who die during Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307592

Write off all student loans for all NHS staff fighting COVID19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/310559

Reimburse nurses for student loans and fund all fees for future student nurses: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302732

Reduce student debt for student nurses and midwives: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300079

Suspend student loan repayments for doctors, nurses and midwives during COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308456

Forgive student debt of all key workers after Pandemic crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307985

Fund all medical degrees to support future doctors and nurses: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/309404
